Html:
Anyone has any success working with Coded UI and Prism?

I am testing the stock trade application sample and its not working.

Thanks,

Ady

Hi,

I'm not familiar with the term Coded UI, could you clarify what you are referring to?

Regards,

Federico Martinez
http://blogs.southworks.net/fmartinez

Thanks Federico.

Its MS testing tools:
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd286726.aspx

I have found a solution that solved my issue with the stock trade app.
http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/pl-PL/vsautotest/thread/a8e3d5dc-a2b7-4e38-8cef-cbb568e21b8c

But our application is more complex and not like in the trade app sample, we don't have reference to the modules, I suspect that it could the problem.
